footer.title: Here we make cool stuff for your head
footer.description: Limited production, pieces that reflect who we are. Style that lasts, materials that endure. We put Saint-Denis on your head.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to your questions quickly

methods.question: What payment methods are accepted on the Casquette website?
methods.answer: We accept payments via Visa, MasterCard, and American Express. All transactions are secured through our Stripe payment platform. You don't need a Stripe account to make a purchase - you can pay directly with your credit card securely.

when.question: When will my purchase be charged?
when.answer:
If your card is valid and the payment is authorized by your bank, your purchase will be charged immediately after order confirmation.

You will instantly receive:
‚Ä¢ An order confirmation email
‚Ä¢ A detailed summary of purchased items
‚Ä¢ Confirmation of the payment method used
‚Ä¢ Your order number for tracking

issues.question: I can't complete my payment, what should I do?
issues.answer:
If you're experiencing payment difficulties, here's what to check:

Common verifications:
‚Ä¢ The billing address matches your card
‚Ä¢ The CVV code (3 digits on the back) is correct
‚Ä¢ The card type (Visa/MasterCard/Amex) is properly selected
‚Ä¢ Your card's expiration date is valid
‚Ä¢ Your card limit hasn't been reached

If the problem persists after these checks, please contact us at panam.nord.est@gmail.com mentioning the error message you received.

security.question: Can I shop safely on Casquette?
security.answer:
Absolutely! Your payment security is our priority.

Casquette uses Stripe, one of the world's most secure payment platforms, trusted by millions of businesses.

Guaranteed security:
‚Ä¢ SSL/TLS encryption for all transactions
‚Ä¢ PCI-DSS Level 1 certification (highest banking standard)
‚Ä¢ No banking data stored on our servers
‚Ä¢ 3D Secure protection for enhanced security
‚Ä¢ Your information protected by the strictest banking protocols

You don't need a Stripe account - pay directly with your card with confidence.

time.question: How long until I receive my order?
time.answer:
For in-stock products:

Processing times:
‚Ä¢ Preparation: 1-2 business days
‚Ä¢ Shipping Monday through Friday
‚Ä¢ Sent via Colissimo with guaranteed 48h delivery

Estimated total time: 4-5 business days (preparation + delivery)

Note: Unforeseen circumstances may occasionally extend delivery by a day or two.

Out-of-stock products:
If your order contains an out-of-stock item, we'll contact you ASAP to:
‚Ä¢ Offer a later delivery date
‚Ä¢ Or provide a full refund

missing.question: I haven't received my order, what's happening?
missing.answer:
If your order hasn't arrived within 6-7 business days after shipping, here's what to do:

1. Check your tracking number
Review your package status with the number provided by email

2. Contact us
Email us at panam.nord.est@gmail.com including:
‚Ä¢ Your order number
‚Ä¢ The tracking number
‚Ä¢ Your delivery address

Our commitment:
Our team will respond ASAP and launch an investigation with Colissimo to locate your package. We'll find a quick solution (reshipping or refund).

international.question: Do you ship internationally?
international.answer:
Yes! We deliver to many countries worldwide.

International shipping costs:
‚Ä¢ Variable depending on destination country
‚Ä¢ Average: ‚Ç¨20
‚Ä¢ Automatically calculated at checkout

Delivery times:
‚Ä¢ Europe: 5-10 business days
‚Ä¢ Rest of world: 10-20 business days

Note: Customs fees and local taxes (if applicable) are the recipient's responsibility.

tracking.question: How do I track my package?
tracking.answer:
Tracking your order is simple and transparent:

1. Shipping confirmation email
Once your order ships, you'll receive an email containing:
‚Ä¢ Your Colissimo tracking number
‚Ä¢ A direct link to tracking

2. Real-time tracking
Click the link or visit laposte.fr to:
‚Ä¢ See your package location in real-time
‚Ä¢ Know the expected delivery date
‚Ä¢ Receive SMS notifications (optional)

Tip: Add the tracking number to your La Poste account for even easier tracking!

cgv.title: Terms & Conditions
cgv.subtitle: Last updated: July 7, 2022
cgv.intro: General terms and conditions of sale for products sold on Casquette

objet.title: Article 1 - Purpose
objet.content: These conditions govern sales by TEDDY WOLFE company specializing in wholesale and retail sales of clothing, fashion accessories and jewelry.

prix.title: Article 2 - Prices
prix.content:
Product prices are indicated in euros including all taxes (VAT and other applicable taxes on the order date), unless otherwise stated and excluding processing and shipping costs.

For orders outside metropolitan France, you are the importer of the product(s). Customs duties or other local taxes or import duties may apply. These duties are not the responsibility of TEDDY WOLFE.

They will be your responsibility in terms of declarations and payments to the competent authorities and organizations in your country. We advise you to inquire about these aspects with your local authorities.

All orders are payable in euros.

TEDDY WOLFE reserves the right to modify its prices at any time, but the product will be invoiced based on the rate in effect at the time of order validation and subject to availability.

Products remain the property of TEDDY WOLFE until full payment.

Attention: as soon as you take physical possession of ordered products, risks of loss or damage are transferred to you.

commandes.title: Article 3 - Orders
commandes.content:
You can place orders on our website. Contractual information is presented in French and will be confirmed no later than order validation.

TEDDY WOLFE reserves the right not to register payment and not to confirm an order for any reason, particularly in case of supply problems or difficulties with the received order.

validation.title: Article 4 - Order Validation
validation.content:
Any order on the Casquette website implies acceptance of these General Conditions. Any order confirmation implies your full and complete acceptance of these general terms of sale, without exception or reservation.

All data provided and recorded confirmation will serve as proof of the transaction.

You declare full knowledge thereof.

Order confirmation will serve as signature and acceptance of operations performed.

A summary of your order information and these General Conditions will be sent to you in PDF format via the order confirmation email address.

paiement.title: Article 5 - Payment
paiement.content:
Validating your order implies an obligation to pay the indicated price.

Payment for your purchases is made by credit card through the secure STRIPE system.

The card is debited immediately.

retractation.title: Article 6 - Withdrawal
retractation.content:
In accordance with Article L.121-21 of the Consumer Code, you have a withdrawal period of 14 days from receipt of your products to exercise your right of withdrawal without justification or penalty.

Returns must be in original condition and complete (packaging, accessories, instructions). Your responsibility is engaged. Any damage to the product may prevent exercise of the withdrawal right.

Return costs are your responsibility.

Upon exercise of withdrawal right, TEDDY WOLFE will refund amounts paid within 14 days of notification via the same payment method used for the order.

EXCEPTIONS TO WITHDRAWAL RIGHT

In accordance with Article L.121-21-8 of the Consumer Code, withdrawal right does not apply to:

‚Ä¢ Fully executed services before withdrawal period end with prior express consumer consent and express waiver of withdrawal right.
‚Ä¢ Goods or services whose price depends on financial market fluctuations beyond professional control occurring during withdrawal period.
‚Ä¢ Custom-made or clearly personalized goods.
‚Ä¢ Goods likely to deteriorate or expire rapidly.
‚Ä¢ Unsealed goods after delivery that cannot be returned for hygiene or health protection reasons.
‚Ä¢ Goods that, after delivery by their nature, are inseparably mixed with other items.

disponibilite.title: Article 7 - Availability
disponibilite.content:
Products are offered while visible on the Casquette site and within available stock limits. For non-stocked products, offers are subject to supplier availability.

In case of product unavailability after order placement, we will inform you by email. Your order will be automatically cancelled with no bank debit.

The Casquette website is not intended to sell products in large quantities. Therefore TEDDY WOLFE reserves the right to refuse orders of 10 identical items.

livraison.title: Article 8 - Delivery
livraison.content:
Products are delivered to the delivery address indicated during the order process, within the timeframe shown on the order validation page.

In case of shipping delay, you will receive an email informing you of potential impact on the indicated delivery time.

In accordance with legal provisions, in case of delivery delay, you may cancel the order under conditions defined in Article L 138-2 of the Consumer Code. If you receive the product in the meantime, we will refund it and shipping costs under conditions of Article L 138-3 of the Consumer Code.

For carrier deliveries, TEDDY WOLFE cannot be held responsible for delivery delays due exclusively to customer unavailability after multiple appointment proposals.

garantie.title: Article 9 - Warranty
garantie.content:
All our products benefit from legal conformity warranty and hidden defects warranty, provided by Articles 1641 and following of the Civil Code. In case of non-conformity of a sold product, it may be returned, exchanged or refunded.

All claims, exchange or refund requests must be made by email to panam.nord.est@gmail.com within 30 days of delivery.

Products must be returned to us in the condition you received them with all elements (accessories, packaging, instructions...). Shipping costs will be refunded based on invoiced rate and return costs will be refunded upon presentation of proof.

This Article does not prevent you from benefiting from the withdrawal right provided in Article 6.

responsabilite.title: Article 10 - Liability
responsabilite.content:
Offered products comply with current French legislation. TEDDY WOLFE liability cannot be engaged for non-compliance with legislation of the country where the product is delivered. It is your responsibility to verify with local authorities the import or use possibilities of products or services you plan to order.

Furthermore, TEDDY WOLFE cannot be held responsible for damages resulting from improper use of the purchased product.

Finally, TEDDY WOLFE liability cannot be engaged for any inconvenience or damage inherent to Internet use, including service interruption, external intrusion or presence of computer viruses.

litiges.title: Article 11 - Applicable Law in Case of Disputes
litiges.content: The language of this contract is French. These terms of sale are subject to French law. In case of dispute, French courts will have sole jurisdiction.

propriete.title: Article 12 - Intellectual Property
propriete.content: All elements of the Casquette site are and remain the intellectual and exclusive property of TEDDY WOLFE. No one is authorized to reproduce, exploit, redistribute, or use in any way, even partially, site elements whether software, visual or audio. Any simple or hypertext link is strictly prohibited without express written agreement from TEDDY WOLFE.

donnees.title: Article 13 - Personal Data
donnees.content:
TEDDY WOLFE reserves the right to collect personal information and data concerning you. They are necessary for managing your order and improving services and information we send you.

They may also be transmitted to companies contributing to these relationships, such as those responsible for executing services and orders for management, execution, processing and payment.

This information and data is also kept for security purposes to comply with legal and regulatory obligations.

In accordance with the law of January 6, 1978, you have the right to access, rectify and object to personal information and data concerning you, directly on the website.

archivage.title: Article 14 - Archiving Proof
archivage.content:
TEDDY WOLFE will archive order forms and invoices on reliable and durable media constituting a faithful copy in accordance with Article 1348 of the Civil Code.

TEDDY WOLFE computerized registers will be considered by all parties concerned as proof of communications, orders, payments and transactions between the parties.

pouletteClub.title: üç∑ Poulette x Paris Nord-Est Collaboration
pouletteClub.p1: An exclusive collaboration with Poulette, the bistronomic table that makes the heart of Paris vibrate. This cap celebrates the Parisian way of life where gastronomy and conviviality meet.
pouletteClub.p2: Proudly displaying the inscription "Poulette Dining Club" accompanied by a wine bottle, this unique piece embodies the spirit of fine dining and shared moments. A nod to those who know how to appreciate the finer things, from plate to accessory.
pouletteClub.p3: üìç Find Poulette at 3 Rue √âtienne Marcel, 75001 Paris

iLoveDrama.title: ‚ú® New Model: I Love Drama
iLoveDrama.p1: Our latest creation! For those who fully embrace their intense side. This minimalist black cap displays a clear message: you're not here to go unnoticed.
iLoveDrama.p2: Because life is too short to be boring, proudly wear your love of strong emotions and plot twists. Warning, guaranteed impact ‚Äì wear it only if you're ready to own it.
